Description:
Detects disabling security tools

Author: Ömer Günal, Alejandro Ortuno, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disabling Security Tools - Builtin
Query: sourcetype='linux-syslog' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%stopping iptables%' or log like '%stopping ip6tables%' or log like '%stopping firewalld%' or log like '%stopping cbdaemon%' or log like '%stopping falcon-sensor%')
